title: Steven Appleby's Encyclopedia of Personal Problems
description: Everyone has a personal problem or seven. Even me! So don't be shy. Buy this book and rush home to the privacy of your own privy! Now, look up your deeply embarrassing personal problem(s). Within moments you'll feel relief wash over you as your little 'difficulty' pales into insignificance when compared to: Possession By The Devil; Premature Ejaculation; Foot-in-mouth-disease; Husbands; Alien Abduction; Bad Hair and much, much more...
author: Steven Appleby
